Package com.example.cs213_5

Class Pizza

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.cs213_5.Pizza
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Customizable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BBQ_Chicken, BuildYourOwn, Deluxe, Meatzza
    public abstract class Pizza
extends java.lang.Object
implements Customizable
    The Pizza abstract class represents a Pizza in the pizza creation system. A Pizza is specified by the type of crust, its size, and the toppings.
